title: Someone changed my email, and I cant change it back to my old one.
body: Well even though this account is banned I still check it and want it unbanned i havent made another account since this one being banned and ive always hoped this would be unbanned so I check my stuff sometimes. So when I checked my email today, I noticed it wasnt my email address. Since you have to send an email to the email address I cant change my email address, can someone specifically at riot help me out with this. Even though this account is banned I would still like access of it.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Even though the account is banned, go ahead and reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once our agents can verify that you were the one who originally created this account, they should be able to help with getting the email changed.
